SiteNameAddress: Banbury Road, Oxford, (Banbury Road University Sites)
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: This site is allocated for mixed use development (including student accommodation and university staff housing) in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
NonHousingDevelopment: The site is also allocated for academic institutional uses.
Notes: Many of the existing buildings on the site contribute to the character of the North Oxford Victorian Suburb Conservation Area or are listed. Therefore any major redevelopment is unlikely to be suitable but there is some potential to intensify existing uses.

SiteNameAddress: Blackbird Leys District Centre, Blackbird Leys Road, Oxford, (Blackbird Leys Central Area)
OwnershipStatus: mixed ownership
DevelopmentDescription: The site is allocated for mixed use development (including housing) in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
NonHousingDevelopment: This site is also allocated for retail, start-up employment units and community facilities.
Notes: Blackbird Leys is one of five priority regeneration areas identified in the Oxford Core Strategy 2026.

SiteNameAddress: Former office and stores for telephone engineering depot, Hollow Way, Oxford, OX3 7JS, (BT Site)
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: The site is allocated for housing or student accommodation development in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
NonHousingDevelopment: No non-residential development included within the allocation.
Notes: At the time of publishing this Brownfield Register, a planning application for 885 student accommodation units on this site was pending determination.

SiteNameAddress: Land at canalside, Oxford, OX2 6BX, (Jericho Canalside)
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Planning permission granted for a mixed use development to include 23 dwellings.
NonHousingDevelopment: Planning permission granted for a mixed use development including a community centre, restaurant, boatyard, public square, winding hole and public bridge across the Oxford Canal.
Notes: The site is in a sensitive location within the Jericho Conservation Area and adjacent to the Grade I listed St. Barnabas Church.

SiteNameAddress: Churchill Hospital and Ambulance Resource Centre, Oxford
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: The site is allocated in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF. Key worker housing linked to the hospital is identified as a suitable use. General housing and student accommodation are identified as acceptable complementary uses.
NonHousingDevelopment: The site is allocated for further hospital related uses as well as a range of other uses linked, or complementary to, the hospital.
Notes: Hospital operations would need to be maintained.

SiteNameAddress: Land at Court Place Gardens, Oxford, OX4 4EW, (Court Place Gardens)
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: The site is allocated for housing development in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
NonHousingDevelopment: No non-residential development included within the allocation.
Notes:
The site includes a listed building. 
This site is partially greenfield and partially brownfield (as shown on the site location plan). The land area in hectares given on this Register relates to the brownfield part of the site only. 
The capacity of this site has been calculated based on development being focused on the existing built footprint.

SiteNameAddress: Templars Square, Between Towns Road, Oxford
OwnershipStatus: mixed ownership
DevelopmentDescription: Resolution to grant planning permission subject to a s106 for a mixed use development to include 225 dwellings.
NonHousingDevelopment: Other uses proposed include retail (Class A1, A3, A4) and hotel.
Notes: Primary District Centre in Oxford's retail hierarchy as set out in the Core Strategy.

DevelopmentDescription: The site is allocated for housing or student accommodation development in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.

SiteNameAddress: Nielsen, London Road, Oxford, OX3 9RX
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription:
The site is allocated for residential-led development in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF. 
Prior approval was granted for the change of use of B1a offices to C3 residential to provide 93 dwellings in 2016/17. There is likely to be further capacity for residential on this site.
NonHousingDevelopment: The site allocation includes employment uses. A hotel is also identified as an appropriate additional use.
Notes:
This site is partially greenfield and partially brownfield (as shown on the site location plan). The land area in hectares given on this Register relates to the brownfield part of the site only.
The capacity has been calculated with the greenfield sports field excluded.
